info.description: purpose api for personal loans and line of credit
info.title: Short Term Finance Purpose

post.summary: this end point contains all the formlets related to the purpose short term finance and user can submit the form as well
post.description: post api for purpose short term loan

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

language.description: The language that the contents of the field are displayed in.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

postcode.description: The postal code of the customer or prospect

country.description: The country component of the base address of a customer

currency.description: Identifies the underlying currency used for the transaction.

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

payoutBeneficiary.description: The beneficiary that payment should be made to .
